title: Back to School
description: Unleash your creativity with our vibrant Lost-It Notes! From organizing life to sparking ideas, they're a must-have. Show your audience how you use Lost-It Notes to help you get back to school.
requirements: Must be a student. Open to accounts on all platforms. Must post with #BackwithLostIt.

title: Organize Your Brilliance
description: Conquer chaos with precision. Lost-It Notes help structure ideas, tasks, and plans. Elevate productivity and watch your goals unfold seamlessly. Show your audience how you stay organized with Lost-It Notes
requirements: Instagram accounts only. Must post with #OrganizedWithLostIt.

title: Color Your Success
description: Infuse positivity into your workflow with Lost-It Notes in an array of inspiring hues. Elevate your organization, boost efficiency, and thrive in a colorful world of accomplishment. Show your audience how you use our different color notes to stay organized.
requirements: Open to accounts on all platforms. Must post with #LostItSuccess.

title: Yoda Ride
description: Embrace the thrill of the open road, make every moment count and share your adventures.
requirements: Instagram accounts only. Must post with #MyYodaRide.
deliverables: 1 in feed post, 2 stories and 5 images
